title: Any players who living in QLD?
body:
The IGNITE E-Sports Centre near Garden City Shopping Centre has opened a couple of month ago

They've got a place for 5vs5 with extraordinary equipment, such as high-frameable computer, Logitech G502, G610.

Check their facebook page out!

[IGNITE E-Sports Centre!](http://facebook.com/igniteesportscentre)

replies.body: I am, but gold coast :(  Shame, they appear to use the same mouse as me!
